entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sioux Lookout
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:49 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -25.9°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 22.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
